Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.server

Class Connection

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.server.Connection
Direct Known Subclasses:
RMIConnection, SocketConnection
public abstract class Connection extends Object
This interface that represents a connection with a client
